survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Mobile Banking Apps
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users about their satisfaction and experience with mobile banking applications, focusing on usability, features, and security.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: This helps gauge engagement levels with the app.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout.

script.question_text: How often do you use your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently in your mobile banking app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Understanding feature usage can help prioritize development efforts.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox layout with an optional 'Other' open-text field.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently in your mobile banking app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: This is a key metric for overall satisfaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for your satisfaction or dissatisfaction with the app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide deeper insights into user sentiments.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for your satisfaction or dissatisfaction with the app?

questions.question_text: How easy is it to navigate through the app?
questions.client_notes: Usability is a critical factor in user satisfaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How easy is it to navigate through the app?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with the app in the past 3 months?
questions.client_notes: Identifying technical issues can help improve app stability.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with the app in the past 3 months?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue(s) you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Detailed feedback can help developers address specific problems.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue(s) you encountered.

questions.question_text: How secure do you feel when using the mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Security perceptions are crucial for trust in banking apps.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How secure do you feel when using the mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: Which security features do you find most reassuring? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Understanding preferred security features can guide future enhancements.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox layout with an optional 'Other' open-text field.

script.question_text: Which security features do you find most reassuring? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the mobile banking app to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) metric to gauge loyalty.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the mobile banking app to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended feedback can highlight areas for improvement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the mobile banking app?
